allocations.name: Public Sale & Liquidity (Airdrop + DEX)

allocations.name: Treasury & Development Fund

allocations.name: Team & Advisors
allocations.releaseSchedule: Quarterly vesting over 24 months after 6-month cliff

lockedWallets.notes: Primary locked wallet for treasury and development

notes: Circulating supply reflects tokens in public markets/liquidity and community wallets; locked/vested funds are excluded from circulating.
